node.text:
A sedentary lifestyle brings with it conditions like periarthritis, frozen shoulder, lower back ache, general body weakness, numbness of extremities and muscular aches; A therapeutic Marma treatment done by a Marma specialist at Favourite Kerala Ayurveda & Spa in The Raviz Kovalam along with calming beach views can help cure ailments that originate due to energy vitiation of Marma points in the body. 
For bookings contact: 0471 – 6691111 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations@theraviz.com
